about-me.title: About me
about-me.description: I am a software developer dedicated to the design and construction of web applications, and with experience and knowledge in both the frontend and backend roles. I've been passionate about technology since I was a teenager, an amateur in sports , drawing and film , and a video game addict .

experience.first-experience-description: Within the development area of the educational entity, I was in charge of the development, maintenance and updating of the applications that integrate the digital ecosystem of the public and private educational system of the Government of Mendoza, especially the GEM educational platform.
